content: MQZ-L Bored plate Galvanized bored plate for fire-tested trapeze assembly and anchoring ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > Standard fixings for support systems- - - ### FEATURES:Features Suitable for MQ strut channels and brackets Easy-to-use single part Applications Attaching strut channels and brackets to walls, ceilings or floors Wing nut or spring nut applications with angles, connectors and brackets Anchor fastening of installation channels ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material composition: S235JR - DIN EN 10025 Surface finish: Indoor Coated - Electro galvanized Environmental conditions: Dry indoor conditions (C1) Indoor with temporary condensation (C2) Technical Data | Material composition | S235JR - DIN EN 10025 | Surface finish | Indoor Coated - Electro galvanized | Environmental conditions | Dry indoor conditions (C1) Indoor with temporary condensation (C2) | Product Class | Standard ### ITEMS- 370632 - Base plate MQZ-L 3/8 - Package Size 20 pc - 370633 - Base plate MQZ-L 1/2 - Package Size 20 pc - 370634 - Base plate MQZ-L 5/8 - Package Size 20 pc
